overview: Leslie has more than 20 years of experience working with start-ups in various finance and operations roles. She joined Cozi after a brief hiatus to spend time with her young daughter Sydney, who is now a successful second grader. Most recently, Leslie was Chief Financial Officer and COO for biotech startup Primal, Inc. Prior to that, she held the positions of Director of Finance, Treasurer, and Director of Investor Relations at Visio, Inc., as well as Director of Finance and Treasurer at ICOS Corp., where she built the finance and administrative departments. Leslie has also held various finance assignments at Bristol-Myers Squibb, as well as the position of Manager of Financial Analysis at Genetic Systems, Inc. Leslie received a B.A. from the University of Maryland and an MBA with an emphasis in finance from Cornell University. Leslie happily resides in Seattle with her husband and daughter.
